com.company

Class AIPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.Player
      • com.company.AIPlayer

  • public class AIPlayer
extends Player
    AIPlayer class extends functionality of Player class by adding 2 functions to automate the decision making necessary for a player in a game of BlackJack, namely deciding to hit/stand and how many chips to bet Created by Ben Rieckers on 4/18/2017.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AIPlayer(int diff)
      Calls Player class constructor with random name from name list and random number of chips.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int amountToBet(int min)
      Calculates random number of chips to bet based on AIPlayer's difficulty
      boolean shouldHit()
      Flag for ATPlayer to hit or stand with their current hand.

      • Methods inherited from class com.company.Player

        getChips, getHand, getIsOut, getName, getNumOfCards, getPot, getTotalCards, isBusted, placeBet, printHand, recieveCard, resetHand, setIsOut, setScore

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AIPlayer

        public AIPlayer(int diff)
        Calls Player class constructor with random name from name list and random number of chips. Also sets difficulty of AIPlayer
        Parameters:
        diff - - difficulty of AIPlayer. (1 min - 3 max)

    • Method Detail

      • shouldHit

        public boolean shouldHit()
        Flag for ATPlayer to hit or stand with their current hand. Based on modified dealer rules with the element of random chance based on the difficulty level of the AIPlayer
        Returns:
        true if AIPlayer should 'hit' with their current hand, false otherwise

      • amountToBet

        public int amountToBet(int min)
        Calculates random number of chips to bet based on AIPlayer's difficulty
        Parameters:
        min - Current table minimum bet
        Returns:
        Integer amount of chips for AIPlayer to bet.
